item.title: Nice messages are comming!
item.description: Working on better messages for the bot What does this mean ? Currently, the bot sends pure text messages. I’m working on EmbededMessages. They look more detached from the rest of the code, and is possible to add more information to them. Emojis are comming as well !

item.title: MassMover Bot v1.0
item.description: First Release ! The first version of the bot was released. This version brought more languages (Spanish and French) and a Summon feature with a new way to move members.

item.title: MassMover Bot Beta
item.description: Beta Release This Beta Version is the first public test of the bot.

item.title: MassMover Multi-Bot
item.description: This is an OpenSource Project available on Github: The MassMover Bot is a Multi-Token Discord Bot. This can be used to split intensive operations, or API limited opperations like the “User Voice Channel Move” opperation (limited by the API). Is is capable of using N “Power Up” Bot connections to perform fast mass “User Move” operations, and the request will be executed by the ammount of bots connected to the server.
